Question: This person brings Luke onto the second Death Star, where the Emperor tries to seduce Luke to the dark side.
Hints: This person then slides too close to a lava flow and catches fire, sustaining life-threatening third-degree burns.
On their list of the 100 Greatest Fictional Characters, Fandomania.com ranked this person at number 6.
This person received the Ultimate Villain recognition at the 2011 Scream Awards.
